org.hedera.pig.load

Class LiteWikipediaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
      • org.hedera.pig.load.LiteWikipediaLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata

    public class LiteWikipediaLoader
extends org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
implements org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata
    This is a UDF loader that pipelines records in Wikipedia XML dump to Pig tuple, using WikipediaPageInputFormat. It outputs a simple schema, which contains only columns defined in Page schema (http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Page_table)
    Author:
    tuan
